Shareholder Name: Khalifa Bin Abdullatif Bin Abdullah Al Mulhem

Description: National Shipping Company of Saudi Arabia (known as: Bahri) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Bahri operates within the Energy sector focusing on Oil and Gas Storage and Transportation. It has Companies operating across Bermuda, UAE, United States and Saudi Arabia. Bahri is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 1979.
Company Name: National Shipping Company of Saudi Arabia (4030)
